meanings.definition: The day on which wages are paid.
meanings.sent1: On paydays, workers are happy to receive their earnings.
meanings.sent2: I always mark my calendar for paydays to make sure I don't forget.
meanings.sent3: The office atmosphere is cheerful on paydays as everyone eagerly awaits their salaries.
meanings.sent4: Paydays are like a bright light at the end of a tunnel, bringing relief and joy.
meanings.sent5: The anticipation of paydays makes the hard work throughout the month worthwhile.

meanings.definition: A day on which one is paid for work.
meanings.sent1: My favorite day of the month is paydays because I get my paycheck.
meanings.sent2: Employees look forward to paydays as it's when they receive their hard-earned money.
meanings.sent3: Some people plan special treats for themselves on paydays to celebrate their earnings.
meanings.sent4: To many, paydays symbolize the fruits of their labor and dedication.
meanings.sent5: The concept of paydays motivates individuals to work diligently and efficiently.

meanings.definition: The day on which an employee receives their salary.
meanings.sent1: On paydays, the company distributes salaries to all its staff members.
meanings.sent2: For many, paydays are a time to budget and plan for expenses.
meanings.sent3: The HR department is always busy on paydays ensuring everyone gets their due payments.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, paydays are crucial for maintaining employee satisfaction.
meanings.sent5: The significance of paydays goes beyond just receiving money; it's about recognition and value.
